forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers this afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 56F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly clear conditions later at night. Low 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.
